verses.name: Matthew 12:45
verses.text: Then goeth he, and taketh with himself seven other spirits more wicked than himself, and they enter in and dwell there: and the last state of that man is worse than the first. Even so shall it be also unto this wicked generation.

verses.name: Matthew 12:46
verses.text: While he yet talked to the people, behold, his mother and his brethren stood without, desiring to speak with him.

verses.name: Matthew 12:47
verses.text: Then one said unto him, Behold, thy mother and thy brethren stand without, desiring to speak with thee.

verses.name: Matthew 12:48
verses.text: But he answered and said unto him that told him, Who is my mother? and who are my brethren?
